participant_1.background:
My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
i am bisexual.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.

participant_2.background:
I can cook when I want to, but it's not my favorite thing to do.
I find that music helps me relax and focus on my studies.
I hide things from my family to protect them.
when i am stressed , i overeat.
i love to sing in the shower.

content.text: I'm glad you find music helps you relax. I love singing in the shower, even if I'm not very good at it.
It's okay, I'm not very good at singing either, but it's so much fun.
I'm glad you have something to help you relax. My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices, but I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
That's good to hear. My family is pretty understanding, but I still hide things from them to protect them.
What kind of things do you hide from them?
Mostly just things that I think they would worry about. Like when I'm feeling stressed, I tend to overeat.
Oh, I understand. I do the same thing. It's hard to deal with stress sometimes, but I'm trying to find healthier ways to cope.
Me too. I'm working on it.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm here to listen if you ever need someone to talk to.
